title: Shadow Ruler
description: End the game by achieving 100% Influence and at least 60% of People.

title: Master Manipulator
description: Convince at least two players to vote Yes on your trade cards three turns in a row.

title: Civilian Hero
description: Achieve more than 90% People after the X-th round and never cause another player to lose People.

title: The Great Collapse
description: Make all three opponents drop below 20% Influence.

title: The Vault Keeper
description: Accumulate over 90% Money (through trades and votes combined).

title: The Ghost Strategist
description: Win the game by winning 2 joker cards.

title: Public Favorite
description: Receive a majority Yes vote from the group at least five times in the game.

title: Double Agent
description: Win the game if the player on your left falls below 30% money and player on right above 70%.

title: Silent Saboteur
description: Cause 100% combined loss of influence when your turn to trade.

title: Underdog Victory
description: Win by achieving a total difference of 80% between money and influence.

title: Silent Monarch
description: End the game with 100% People and have the lowest Money among all players.

title: The Influencer
description: Convince all players to vote No at least twice on your trades during the game.

title: Protector of the Masses
description: Reach 95% People by round 6 without losing consecutive 20% yourself throughout the game.

title: Collapse Architect
description: Make two players fall below 25% People by the end of round 8.

title: Money Mogul
description: Finish with more than 95% Money while Influence is below 40%.

title: Joker Master
description: Activate 2 Joker cards and gain a net positive from all of them.

title: Crowd Charmer
description: Earn unanimous Yes votes (3/3) on two separate trade turns.

title: Flipping the Scales
description: End the game with more than 70% Influence and ensure the player across from you has less than 30% People.

title: Saboteur Supreme
description: Cause a total of 80% Influence loss across all players by round 6.
